greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest multiple of n sandwiched between twin primes.
comment: Conjecture: lim sup n ->infinity a(n)/n^2 exists = C, where 0<C<1. - _Benoit Cloitre_, May 23 2002
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
mathematica: Table[ s = 2; While[ Mod[s, n] + 2 - Boole[ PrimeQ[s - 1]] - Boole[ PrimeQ[s + 1]] > 0, s++]; s, {n, 1, 55}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 08 2011, after Pari *)
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 22 2002
